description:
Version 2.0.3 brings online backup/restore.

Financial management made easy!  Tired of financial management apps that are overly confusing and can't hold your attention span?  Bills Vs Income+ is a TouchPad optimized financial management app to help you easily manage your bills, incomes, accounts, & budgets.

Bills Vs Income gives you a month to month look at your finances that will let you know your financial outlook for the current month and for month's to come.  Rather than complicate thing, Bills Vs Income+ aims to keep things simple so once you enter your information, very little maintenance will need to be done to accurately track your finances.

Some unique features include:
-Unpaid Bill reminders so you never miss a payment again
-Handles unlimited number of Accounts, and can easily switch between them
-Optional Backup and Restore using Google Docs
-Multiple occurrences allows you to have a bill or income scheduled every 'x' days/weeks/months/etc...
-Keypad entry for number input
-Bill and income manager to help you keep track of what you've paid or received so far
-Monthly Budgets that allow you to easily enter transactions & track your progress
-Website storage for each bill gives you a quick shortcut in order to pay your bill on your TouchPad
-Notes for each bill/income lets you store whatever information you need
-Pin number to lock your data
-Multiple Currencies

Please contact the developer with any ideas or questions (MachiApps1@gmail.com)
